translation.en: Everyone, be careful. We're almost there.
Lord, when I said, "Cross my heart and hope to die young and pretty,"
translation.ko: 주님, 젊고 예쁠 때 죽겠다고 맹세한 게

translation.en: I did not mean today!
Ray Ray, stop being so dramatic.
translation.ko: 레이 레이, 오버 좀 하지 마

translation.en: I'm not going to stop being me right before I die!
translation.ko: 죽기 직전인데 내 모습을 버리진 않을 거야!

translation.en: No one is going to die-- [screams]
Amber, don't fall. I got us a Groupon for a couple's massage.
translation.ko: 앰버, 떨어지면 안 돼! 1+1 커플 마사지 끊어놨다고!

translation.en: I'd rather plummet to my death.
[screams] I'm slipping! Hold on!
[Amber grunts] Kaylie!
[paparazzi shouting] Kaylie!
Order!
Ooh, I'd love a sparkling water with a slice of cucumber. Thank you!
translation.ko: 정수요? 전 오이 띄운 탄산수로요 고마워요!

translation.en: The defendant,
Kaylee Konrad,
gunned her Mercedes through a Dolce & Gabbana display window,
committing aggravated assault
on a bunch of really surprised mannequins.
It was an accident.
Sorry, guys.
Besides, mock turtlenecks, that's the real crime.
-[gavel banging] -Order! And I said no cameras.
Just be quiet and look pretty.
translation.ko: 입 다물고 외모만 신경 써 그나저나 입술이 얇아

translation.en: BTW, your lips look thin. I told you to plump.
translation.ko: 입 다물고 외모만 신경 써 그나저나 입술이 얇아 볼록 내밀라고 했잖니

translation.en: Miss Konrad, do you have anything you'd like to say?
Yes, Your Honor. [clears throat]
I believe our justice system needs to stop persecuting innocent celebrities
translation.ko: 우리 사법제도는 무고한 셀럽 박해를 멈추고

translation.en: and start paying more attention to what's happening in our communities.
translation.ko: 지역 사회에서 벌어지는 일에 더 많은 관심을 가져야 해요

translation.en: I rest my briefcase.
-[gavel bangs] -[Judge] Order.
You're not innocent, and I should send you to jail.
translation.ko: 피고는 무고하지 않아요 감옥에 가야 하죠

translation.en: No! She could never handle that.
translation.ko: 안 돼요! - 케일리는 절대 감당 못 합니다 - 감당할 수 있어요

translation.en: I could so.
translation.ko: - 케일리는 절대 감당 못 합니다 - 감당할 수 있어요

translation.en: Please! You once had to ride in the back of a non-stretch limo,
translation.ko: 무슨 소리니 의자가 안 젖혀지는 리무진 뒷좌석에 탔다가

translation.en: and you broke out in hives.
It had faux leather seats!
I'm lucky to be alive.
Although, ratings could go through the roof.
[gasps] We could make a fortune on the Kaylie Dream Cell.
translation.ko: 케일리의 꿈 같은 감방으로 큰돈을 버는 거야

translation.en: Shiv sold separately.
I'd buy that.
Miss Konrad, since you mentioned community,
translation.ko: 정숙, 콘래드 씨 지역 사회를 언급하셨으니 1년의 사회봉사 명령을

translation.en: I hereby sentence you to one year of community service.
translation.ko: 지역 사회를 언급하셨으니 1년의 사회봉사 명령을 선고합니다

translation.en: That is so sweet! The community's gonna work for me for a whole year?
translation.ko: 너무 친절하시네요! 지역 사회가 절 위해 1년간 일해준다고요?

translation.en: ♪ Team Kaylie, ay, ay Team Kaylie ♪
translation.ko: 팀 케일리, 에이 에이 팀 케일리

translation.en: ♪ Where's a map? 'Cuz I could use directions ♪
♪ To get from Hollywood to firewood ♪
♪ Even though I don't know Where I'm headin' ♪
♪ I'm making friends and looking good ♪
♪ We may not belong But who cares? Bring it on ♪
translation.ko: 우린 안 어울릴지 몰라도 상관없어 덤벼봐

translation.en: ♪ 'Cuz I know we're gonna find our way ♪
♪ Team Kaylie ♪
♪ When your life gets wild Follow me through the wilderness ♪
translation.ko: 팀 케일리, 인생이 꼬이면 나를 따라 자연으로 가는 거야

translation.en: ♪ Team Kaylie ♪
♪ Roughing it in style Together, yeah, we'll be killin' it ♪
translation.ko: 팀 케일리, 아주 멋지게 야영하지 함께라면 끝내주게 해낼 거야

translation.en: ♪ Team Kaylie, ay, ay Team Kaylie ♪
translation.ko: 팀 케일리, 에이 에이 팀 케일리

translation.en: -Okay, how does that look? -Perfect.
translation.ko: "피코 야영 클럽 포큐파인즈 파이팅!" - 다 됐다, 어때? - 완벽해

translation.en: Perfect would be you and me in the cafeteria
Lady and the Tramp-ing a strand of spaghetti.
translation.ko: 스파게티 한 가닥을 나눠 먹는 거지

translation.en: I've got an in with the lunch lady.
And I still have a thumb tack.
So... rain check?
[Chewy] Ow!
Silence!
Valeria, what are you doing back there?
Putting a Santeria curse on Mr. Jabowski.
[chuckles] That's the last time he gives me detention.
translation.ko: 방과 후 남는 건 이번이 마지막이 될 거야

translation.en: This deadly curse will follow Mr. Jabowski and his children's children's children
translation.ko: 이 저주는 자바우스키 선생님과 그 자손들에게도 이어질 것이다

translation.en: until the end of time!
And if that doesn't work, these shells are super sharp,
and I left one on his chair.
Wow, this turnout is lamer than the Spice Girls reunion tour.
translation.ko: 어쩜, 회원 수가 스파이스 걸스 재결합 투어보다 볼품없네

translation.en: Baby Spice pushing 50? That's just sad.
Ray Ray!
Did you come to your senses and decide to join our Wilderness Club?
translation.ko: 정신 차리고 우리 야영 클럽에 들기로 한 거야?

translation.en: Baby girl, we've been over this.
translation.ko: 자기야, 이 얘긴 끝났잖아 나랑 흙은 안 맞는다니까

translation.en: I look good in everything, except dirt, and culottes.
translation.ko: 자기야, 이 얘긴 끝났잖아 나랑 흙은 안 맞는다니까 치마바지랑

translation.en: I have got to work on my calves.
But the kickoff hike to Sunset Peak is today!
translation.ko: 첫 대결인 선셋 피크 하이킹이 오늘이라고!

translation.en: Ten teams from our school district compete,
and whoever plants their flag at the top first gets a Silver Pine Cone!
translation.ko: 정상에 먼저 깃발을 꽂는 팀이 은색 솔방울을 얻게 돼!

translation.en: You lost me at hike.
You know we've been tight since we were in diapers.
Mine were stylish. Yours were just... full.
translation.ko: 내 건 스타일리시했고 네 건 그냥 가득 차 있었지

translation.en: But when it comes to Mother Nature, Ray Ray is JOMO.
translation.ko: 하지만 레이 레이는 대자연의 기회를 놓치는 게 기뻐

translation.en: But we need all the help we can get!
I do not want to lose again to those spoiled, snotty Lumberjacks.
translation.ko: 버릇없고 건방진 럼버잭스한테 또 지긴 싫어

translation.en: May they choke on their filthy money 'til their blood-soaked eyeballs burst
translation.ko: 더러운 돈이 목에 걸려서 피투성이 눈알이

translation.en: from their skulls!
Which is exactly what happened last year
translation.ko: 작년에 거스턴블랫 선생님이 집라인 타다가 뇌졸중 와서

translation.en: when Miss Gerstonblatt had a stroke on the zipline.
translation.ko: 작년에 거스턴블랫 선생님이 집라인 타다가 뇌졸중 와서 그렇게 됐잖아

translation.en: And now we don't have an adult to lead our Wilderness Club.
translation.ko: 그래서 야영 클럽을 인솔할 어른이 없고

translation.en: We don't need an adult.
My mom and I used to go camping all the time, so I can lead us to victory.
translation.ko: 엄마랑 캠핑 많이 다녀봐서 내가 우승으로 이끌 수 있다고

translation.en: But the rules say we need an adult.
Screw the rules.
But rules lead to order, and order leads to lists, and lists lead to happiness.
translation.ko: 하지만 규정은 정돈, 정돈은 목록 목록은 행복으로 이어지잖아

translation.en: Besides, no one at the school ever wants the job anyway.
translation.ko: 게다가 학교에선 이 일을 아무도 안 맡으려 한다고

translation.en: Especially after Miss Gerstonblatt took that zipline to heaven.
translation.ko: 특히 거스턴블랫 선생님이 집라인 타고 천국 가신 후로

translation.en: And you think some stranger is just going to walk through that door
translation.ko: 갑자기 모르는 사람이 저 문으로 들어와서 이럴 것 같아?

translation.en: and say, "Let me lead you"?
Let me lead you.
Oh! Hello.
-OMG, that's Kaylie Konrad! -Who cares?
translation.ko: - 세상에, 케일리 콘래드야! - 누가 신경 쓴대?

translation.en: Everyone!
See? I'm a do-gooder.
Kaylie Konrad picks up trash!
That was my lunch!
Kaylie Konrad helps homeless children.
I'm not homeless.
Oh. Awkward.
I curse you.
Okay, we're done. Remember, I'll be at NOBU tonight.
translation.ko: 여기까지 하죠 오늘 밤 노부 식당에서 봐요

translation.en: I have to meet Kaylie. What do I do?
Just stay cool.
Right. Cool.
I love you, Kaylie Konrad! Can I touch you?
[giggles] I touched her!
You do know what cool means, right?
Excuse me, Miss Konrad, what are you doing at Pico Middle School?
translation.ko: 저기요, 콘래드 씨 피코 중학교엔 무슨 일이죠?

translation.en: And you should be wearing a visitor's pass.
I just reprimanded Kaylie Konrad!
Your principal sent me to this room to help you guys out with some club.
translation.ko: 너희 교장 선생님이 무슨 클럽을 도와주라 하셨어

translation.en: So, where's the VIP area?
Oh, no way!
You come with me.
You're the smallest bouncer I've ever seen.
Principal Dana, I need a different do-gooder thingy.
translation.ko: 데이나 교장 선생님 다른 선행 봉사를 할게요

translation.en: This tiny bouncer here says that we might have to walk through dirt.
translation.ko: 이 작은 문지기가 흙을 밟아야 할지도 모른다는데

translation.en: Yeah, I do not see myself doing that.
translation.ko: 전 그런 거 상상도 못 해요

translation.en: Well, I did not see myself scoping Tinder every night
translation.ko: 나도 매일 밤 차가운 통조림 라비올리를 먹으며

translation.en: eating cold ravioli out of a can, but... here we are.
translation.ko: 나도 매일 밤 차가운 통조림 라비올리를 먹으며 틴더를 할지 상상도 못 했지만 지금 이러고 있죠

translation.en: Aw, you're so lucky you can Tinder. I'm way too famous.
translation.ko: 틴더를 할 수 있다니 좋으시겠어요 전 그걸 하기엔 너무 유명해서요

translation.en: And TBH, you might do better on Silver Singles.
translation.ko: 솔직히 실버 싱글스에서 더 잘나가실 것 같아요

translation.en: On there, you're like a seven, minimum!
Principal Dana, we don't need an adult, especially not her!
translation.ko: 저희 클럽은 성인이 필요 없어요 특히 케일리는요!

translation.en: I have tons of wilderness experience, so I should be the leader.
translation.ko: 야영 경험이 풍부한 제가 리더를 맡아야죠

translation.en: And I should be in Paris.
I'm missing Fashion Week, and it's missing moi.
Okay, I feel for you both as much as my pain medication will let me, but...
translation.ko: 진통제가 드는 만큼 두 사람의 고통도 느껴지지만

translation.en: the judge sent Kaylie to me, I sent her to you, and that's that.
translation.ko: 판사님은 케일리를 나한테 보냈고 난 너한테 보냈으니, 얘기 끝이다

translation.en: Did that sound commanding? I've been practicing in front of my cats.
translation.ko: 위엄 있어 보였나요? 고양이들 앞에서 연습했거든요

translation.en: -[both] But-- -All right, fine. You win.
All right, Amber, you can lead a bunch of teenagers into the woods unsupervised,
translation.ko: 앰버는 관리자 없이 십 대들을 이끌고 숲에 가고

translation.en: -and Kaylie you can go to Paris. -[both] Really?
No!
Apparently, I need to work on my sarcasm in front of my cats too.
Principal Dana, even if we do need an adult,
translation.ko: 교장 선생님, 어른이 필요해도 과연 케일리 콘래드가

translation.en: do you really think Kaylie Konrad is the best choice?
translation.ko: 교장 선생님, 어른이 필요해도 과연 케일리 콘래드가 최선의 선택일까요?

translation.en: This is the girl that cried on her reality show
translation.ko: 자기 리얼리티 쇼에서 차에 새똥이 떨어졌다고

translation.en: when her car got bird poop on it.
translation.ko: 자기 리얼리티 쇼에서 차에 새똥이 떨어졌다고 운 사람이라고요

translation.en: [crying] No! No!
Not my car!
Okay, to be fair, that bird had some serious stomach issues.
translation.ko: 저 새는 똥 냄새가 장난 아니었다고요

translation.en: You look stupid.
All I'm saying is I wanna beat the Lumberjacks this year,
which is going to be really tough, and Kaylie Konrad could never handle that.
translation.ko: 럼버잭스는 강한 상대인 데다 케일리 콘래드는 감당 못 해요

translation.en: [Kit] Kaylie could never handle that.
Wait. You don't think I can do it?
translation.ko: 잠깐, 내가 감당 못 할 거라고?

translation.en: Nobody does!
I mean, if you last longer than a week, I owe the judge a dinner at Sizzler.
translation.ko: 당신이 일주일 넘게 버티면 내가 판사님한테 저녁 사죠

translation.en: Well, you're wrong, and I'll prove it.
Ooh, can you prove it somewhere else? I just got a message from OkCupid.
translation.ko: 다른 데서 증명하면 안 될까요? 오케이큐피드에서 메시지 왔네요

translation.en: Apparently, a Nigerian prince wants to meet me.
This could be my last chance at happiness.
Okay, now I just need to send him my bank account information.
-But Principal Dana-- -Ah.
It's Princess Dana to you.
Off you go.
Greetings,
my Nigerian subjects.
Remember, everything the light touches is mine.
translation.ko: 빛이 닿는 모든 것은 내 겁니다

translation.en: All right, kids, to the wilderness!
-The door is that way. -The door is that way!
Wait for Ray Ray!
Had to get my wilderness look on point.
I thought dirt wasn't your color?
Turns out, I go with everything.
translation.ko: 알고 보니 난 뭐든 잘 맞더라고

translation.en: So can I go with you? Please, please, please!
Okay, just no more touching my hair.
I promise. Cross my heart and hope to die young and pretty.
translation.ko: 약속해요 젊고 예쁠 때 죽겠다고 맹세할게요

translation.en: Okay. Let's see here.
Uh, Miss Konrad, that's a star map of celebrity homes.
translation.ko: 콘래드 씨, 이건 셀럽 집을 표시한 스타 맵이잖아요

translation.en: Oh, I know.
I just wanted to show you that my house is bigger than Gigi Hadid's. Yay!
translation.ko: 내 집이 지지 하디드 집보다 큰 걸 보여주고 싶었어, 좋아라!

translation.en: Yay!
I know which way to go.
We head north to get to Sunset Peak where we plant our flag,
translation.ko: 선셋 피크로 가서 깃발 꽂으려면 북쪽으로 가야 해요, 방향은...

translation.en: which is... this way.
translation.ko: 선셋 피크로 가서 깃발 꽂으려면 북쪽으로 가야 해요, 방향은... - 이쪽이네요 - 어쩜!

translation.en: Aw! Is that a picture of you and your mom?
That's so sweet.
She doesn't look like she's judging you.
We have to hurry.
-Wait. I don't have a signal. -Kaylie needs a signal!
translation.ko: - 잠깐, 신호가 안 잡혀 - 케일리가 신호 필요하대!

translation.en: Stars, they're just like us.
There's no cell service in the woods.
[sighs] Fine. I'll use the Wi-Fi.
What's the password?
We're going to die out here.
Is that all lowercase?
[sighs] Let's go! We have to beat the Lumberjacks to the peak!
translation.ko: 어서 가요! 럼버잭스보다 먼저 도착해야 해요!

translation.en: In your dreams, Porcupukes!
Emphasis on the "poor."
Drop dead, Lumberjerks.
Emphasis on "drop dead."
I curse the Lumberjerks!
I think someone already has. How else can you explain those outfits?
translation.ko: 이미 저주받은 것 같은데 저 의상을 봐

translation.en: May your blisters get blisters until your shoes are drenched in blood!
translation.ko: 물집 위에 또 물집 잡혀서 신발이 피로 흠뻑 젖기를!

translation.en: Yeah, that happened to me once at a photoshoot for Manolo Blahnik.
translation.ko: 나 마놀로 블라닉 사진 촬영 때 그런 적 있어

translation.en: Twelve straight hours in six-inch stilettos...
I still can't get my heels down.
Kaylie Konrad? What are you doing with these lames?
translation.ko: 케일리 콘래드? 이 덜떨어진 애들이랑 뭐 해요?

translation.en: I'm the leader of the lames!
No, she's not.
We're her punishment.
She's ours.
Who cares? We're gonna beat you like a baby seal!
translation.ko: 관심 없어 너희를 아기 물개처럼 이겨주지!

translation.en: And win that annual Wilderness Trophy, just like last year.
[man] Afternoon, y'all.
Wow. You're like a real-life pickup truck commercial.
translation.ko: 현실 속 픽업트럭 광고를 보는 것 같네

translation.en: I'm Colt Axelrod, new volunteer leader of the Lumberjacks.
translation.ko: 난 콜트 액설로드야 럼버잭스 자원봉사 지도자지

translation.en: Sorry, no autographs.
It's not fair to the kids.
Uh, excuse me. Am I supposed to know who you are?
Yes.
This is Kaylie Konrad, as in the Konrad Kronicles,
biggest reality TV show ever.
I don't own a TV.
I'd rather hike, or fish, or read.
translation.ko: 그 시간에 하이킹이나 낚시 독서를 하지

translation.en: Oh, you mean like on a Kindle?
Uh, no, a book. [chuckles] It's like a Kindle...
translation.ko: 아니, 책 말이야 킨들 같은 건데

translation.en: but it's a book.
I think people spend way too much time on their devices and all that social media nonsense.
translation.ko: 사람들은 전자기기랑 무의미한 SNS를 너무 많이 해

translation.en: [scoffs] Nonsense? That nonsense paid for my private island
translation.ko: 무의미하다고? 그 덕분에 개인 섬을 사서 내 얼굴이 찍힌 돈도 만들었는걸

translation.en: where all the money has my face on it.
translation.ko: 그 덕분에 개인 섬을 사서 내 얼굴이 찍힌 돈도 만들었는걸

translation.en: Twenty Kaylies buys a lobster dinner.
Well, hey, as I've tried to tell these kids, money can't buy you happiness.
translation.ko: 우리 팀한테도 말했지만 돈으로는 행복을 살 수 없어

translation.en: Well, clearly you've never jet skied off a mega-yacht.
translation.ko: 대형 요트에서 제트 스키 안 타봤구나

translation.en: No, but I once jumped off a kayak to save a wounded beaver.
translation.ko: 응, 하지만 카약에서 내려 다친 비버를 구한 적은 있어

translation.en: I named him Bucky.
Let's go!
Let's go! Let's go! Let's go!
Hold on.
No way can we compete with them. Did you see their calves?
translation.ko: 우린 쟤네 절대 못 이겨 종아리 봤어?

translation.en: Well, if we can't catch them, might as well just give up and go home.
translation.ko: 못 따라잡을 것 같으면 그냥 포기하고 집에 가자

translation.en: You had me at "give up."
Don't give up.
May the best team win.
We Porcupines do not give up!
We're proud, prickly, and persistent! Now let's run!
Easy for you to say. Your heels still touch the ground.
translation.ko: 말이야 쉽지 난 뒤꿈치가 땅에 안 닿는다니까

translation.en: Why don't we just take that shortcut?
I don't think that's a good idea.
Yeah, we're supposed to stick to the trail.
[scoffs] Says who?
Literally everyone.
Okay, are you gonna listen to a bunch of signs
translation.ko: "산길로 다니세요" 여러 차례 신중하게 고민하고 계획해서 만든 표지판을 따를래?

translation.en: that were placed here with a lot of careful thought and planning,
translation.ko: 여러 차례 신중하게 고민하고 계획해서 만든 표지판을 따를래?

translation.en: or are you gonna listen to me?
And before you answer, may I remind you that I won a People's Choice Award.
translation.ko: 대답하기 전에 나 피플스 초이스상 받은 사람이야

translation.en: It's your only shot at winning. No offense to your cool blister curse.
translation.ko: 이길 방법은 이것뿐이야 네 물집 저주를 무시한 건 아니고

translation.en: None taken. BTW, have you noticed any warts popping up on you?
translation.ko: 괜찮아요 근데 몸에 사마귀 안 났나요?

translation.en: Ew, no.
Why?
No reason.
Well, since we'll never catch them on the trail,
I guess we have to try it your way.
Yay, I'm a leader! Follow me!
I knew I'd be walking through dirt.
Didn't know I'd be eating it.
Watch your step. It's slippery.
We're not gonna make it! Kaylie, can I please be buried with you?
translation.ko: 우린 여기서 죽을 거야! 케일리, 옆에 묻혀도 돼요?

translation.en: No, because when I die, my mom wants me cremated so she can use my ashes
translation.ko: 안 돼, 엄마가 나 죽으면 화장해서 재를 팔 거랬거든

translation.en: to sell limited edition genuine platinum-plated necklaces.
Whoa! That's cold.
No, it's not! She promised to give me half the profits.
But... you'll be dead.
Then I want 100% of the profits!
That'll show her.
Lord, when I said, "Cross my heart and hope to die young and pretty,"
translation.ko: 주님, 젊고 예쁠 때 죽겠다고 맹세한 게

translation.en: I did not mean today!
No one is going to die-- [screams]
Amber, don't fall! I got us a Groupon for a couple's massage.
translation.ko: 앰버, 떨어지면 안 돼! 1+1 커플 마사지 끊어놨다고!

translation.en: I'd rather plummet to my death.
[screams] I'm slipping! Hold on!
[grunts] Kaylie!
I'll get you.
Ah! I see a foothold.
That's more like a toehold!
That's all I need. Thank you, Manolo Blahnik!
translation.ko: 그 정도면 충분해 감사해요, 마놀로 블라닉!

translation.en: Amber, grab my hand.
-I can't. I'll fall! -[Kaylie] No, you won't!
translation.ko: - 못 해요, 그러다 떨어져요! - 안 떨어져!

translation.en: There's a toehold near your right foot. Feel for it,
translation.ko: 네 오른발 근처에 발 디딜 곳이 있어 공간을 찾아봐

translation.en: and when you're ready, give me your hand, and I'll pull you up.
I can't find it!
[Kaylie] Okay, just a little to your right.
Yes, right there! Come on. [grunts]
Are you okay?
Yeah. I just can't stop thinking
translation.ko: 응 추이와 커플 마사지 받을 생각 하니까 미치겠어

translation.en: about getting a couple's massage with Chewy.
translation.ko: 추이와 커플 마사지 받을 생각 하니까 미치겠어

translation.en: Look, we're almost on solid ground! Let's go.
translation.ko: 저기 봐! 평지에 거의 다 왔어! 어서 가자

translation.en: Careful. Yeah.
Okay. Everybody, grab on to this scarf.
But it's my mom's, so don't drop it, or she'll fire me.
translation.ko: 엄마 거니까 조심해 떨어뜨리면 나 퇴출당해

translation.en: From the show? From the family.
Okay, so we've got to keep going, or we'll never catch the Lumberjacks.
translation.ko: 멈추지 말고 계속 가야지 럼버잭스를 따라잡을 수 있어

translation.en: Which way do we go?
My compass, it's gone.
Oh, no! It must have fallen out of your pocket when you fell.
translation.ko: 어떡해! 너 떨어질 때 주머니에서 빠졌나 보다

translation.en: So let's recap.
Your shortcut got us lost, which made me lose my compass.
translation.ko: 지름길로 오자고 해서 길도 잃고 내 나침반도 사라졌어요

translation.en: So now we're going to lose to the Lumberjacks again!
And it's all your fault!
Amber, wait!
What's the matter with her?
She's upset because that was her mom's compass.
They always used it when they went camping.
But then her mom died last year.
They were super close, and it's been really hard on her.
Oh, no.
Poor Amber. No wonder she's so upset.
You guys wait here.
I should go too.
My shawty needs some sweet X's and O's from her love thug Chewy.
translation.ko: 내 사랑에겐 추이의 키스랑 포옹이 필요해

translation.en: Hasn't she suffered enough?
That seat's taken.
Weird. When I made the reservation,
I specifically requested this uncomfortable spot on the ground.
translation.ko: 예약 잡을 때 구체적으로 이 불편한 바닥을 요청했거든

translation.en: [laughs] Just kidding.
I'm a celebrity. I don't need reservations.
translation.ko: 난 셀럽이라 예약 안 해도 되거든

translation.en: Amber, I am so incredibly sorry about your mom's compass.
translation.ko: 앰버, 엄마 나침반을 잃어버린 거 정말 미안해

translation.en: Hey.
You know what's weird?
This is the first time I haven't been able to hear the freeway in a long time.
translation.ko: 정말 오랜만에 고속도로 위 자동차 소리가 안 들려

translation.en: It's kind of nice.
Peaceful.
Don't you think?
I guess.
Until a bear comes along. Good thing I can run faster than you.
translation.ko: 그러다 곰이 나타나면 끝이에요 내가 케일리보다 빨라서 다행이죠

translation.en: That's what you think. I've been outrunning the paparazzi since I was two,
translation.ko: 과연 그럴까? 난 2살 때부터 파파라치를 피해 도망 다녔어

translation.en: which is not easy in bedazzled booties.
You know,
when my mom and I went camping,
this is how we chose our spot.
When we couldn't hear the cars anymore.
translation.ko: 더는 차 소리가 안 들리는 곳으로요

translation.en: I get that.
And...
now I get why you like being out in nature so much.
translation.ko: 네가 왜 자연에 오는 걸 좋아하는지 알겠어

translation.en: It's because of your mom, right?
You know what's dumb?
It's not like it's gonna bring her back.
No, but...
remembering the things that you guys shared,
translation.ko: 두 사람이 함께했던 걸 잊지 않으면

translation.en: it helps keep her here.
And I think she's still here.
She would be so proud of you.
I don't know why.
Are you kidding?
Look at all the stuff you know! How to read a trail,
translation.ko: 넌 많은 걸 알고 있잖아! 산길도 읽을 줄 알고

translation.en: the fact the wilderness cruelly prevents cell phone service.
Are you absolutely sure about that one?
I'm sure.
Plus, you never give up.
And you're a great leader.
I just got us lost and put all you kids in danger.
translation.ko: 난 너희가 길을 잃고 위험에 빠지게 했지

translation.en: Another Kaylie catastrophe, as my mom would say.
translation.ko: 엄마 말처럼 또다시 케일리 참사를 일으켰어

translation.en: What?
Your mom must be super proud of you.
Nope. Actually, she just thinks I'm a mess and can't handle anything.
translation.ko: 아니, 우리 엄마는 내가 엉망이고 아무것도 감당 못 할 거라 생각해

translation.en: You are not a mess, and you sure handled everything back on that cliff.
translation.ko: 케일리는 엉망도 아니고 절벽에선 모든 걸 잘 감당했어요

translation.en: Listen, you stayed calm,
and you saved my life.
Thanks for that, by the way.
You're welcome.
So, you mean my mom might actually be... wrong?
translation.ko: 그럼 우리 엄마가 틀렸을 수도 있다고?

translation.en: Maybe I can handle stuff?
-I do. -[sighs]
And I think the Porcupines could use an adult leader after all.
translation.ko: 그리고 포큐파인즈는 어른 리더가 필요한 것 같아요

translation.en: Well, co-leader.
Okay, something just messed with my hair, and I don't think it was Ray Ray!
translation.ko: 무언가 내 머리를 망가뜨렸는데 레이 레이는 아닌 것 같아!

translation.en: I think that's bird poop.
Okay.
Kaylie!
A bird just pooped on your head, and you didn't freak out!
translation.ko: 새가 머리에 똥을 쌌는데 안 놀랐네요!

translation.en: -Told you you can handle anything. -[chuckles]
Well if that's the case, what are we doing just sitting here?
translation.ko: 그렇다면 여기 앉아서 뭐 하는 거야?

translation.en: -We should go beat those Lumberjerks! -Yeah!
Oh, but don't you want me to wipe that poop out of your hair first?
translation.ko: 근데 새똥부터 먼저 닦아야 하지 않을까요?

translation.en: Yeah, but with what?
How about your mom's scarf?
Think I can handle that.
Okay.
Thanks, Amber. Let's go.
-The trail is that way! -The trail is that way!
Finally!
I was starting to get worry wrinkles.
Hey, guys. What'd we miss?
Well, Chewy and Valeria are currently trying to trip a caterpillar,
translation.ko: 추이랑 발레리아는 애벌레를 넘어뜨리려 하고 있어서

translation.en: so I'm going to go with nothing.
Are you okay?
Yeah, but I'd be better if we knew which way to go.
We'll never get off this mountain.
translation.ko: 우린 이 산에서 못 벗어날 거야

translation.en: On the bright side, Kaylie Konrad's final selfie will be with me!
translation.ko: 좋게 생각하면 케일리 콘래드의 마지막 셀카는 나랑 찍게 되겠지

translation.en: The whole world will mourn Kaylie and Ray Ray.
translation.ko: 전 세계가 케일리와 레이 레이를 애도할 거야

translation.en: Uh, well, Kaylie anyway.
Aw, Valeria.
So, you like me now?
Duh. Otherwise, you'd have a giant curly hair growing out of your cheek.
translation.ko: 당연하죠, 안 그러면 뺨에서 곱슬머리가 나고 있을걸요

translation.en: Okay, you always want the sun in front of you for the best lighting.
translation.ko: 태양을 마주 보고 찍어야 해 햇빛은 최고의 조명이거든

translation.en: Don't squint.
-Kaylie, that's it! -I know! That's like Selfie 101.
translation.ko: - 케일리, 그거예요! - 내 말이! 셀카 입문 공식이지

translation.en: No, I mean the sun is in front of us, and it sets in the west, right?
translation.ko: 아뇨, 우리 앞에 있는 태양은 서쪽으로 지잖아요

translation.en: So that way is west!
Right! And if Dudley is driving me west on Wilshire,
translation.ko: 맞아! 더들리가 윌셔가에서 서쪽으로 차를 몰면

translation.en: then we turn right to go to Burke Williams!
translation.ko: 우회전해야 버크 윌리엄스로 갈 수 있어!

translation.en: That's where I got our Groupon!
translation.ko: 그루폰으로 산 게 그 스파 쿠폰이야!

translation.en: So north must be that way!
Which means we need to go that way to get to Sunset Peak!
translation.ko: 선셋 피크로 가려면 저쪽으로 가야 해요!

translation.en: Which is right here!
That's not Sunset Peak. That's Selena Gomez's house.
Oh, right.
Which is also smaller than my house. Yay!
Again!
I... hate... hiking.
On the bright side, my calves are going to look amazing.
translation.ko: 그래도 좋게 보면 종아리가 탄탄해지고 있어

translation.en: I could have flown to the peak by now.
But, "No," you said. "Leave your broom at home," you said.
translation.ko: 네가 빗자루 못 가져오게 해서 이 고생이잖아

translation.en: We're almost at the top!
I hope we beat the Lumberjacks!
Hey, Porcupoops!
So what took you so long?
I was visiting your mom in prison.
She was framed!
That was mean.
I am so sorry. I had no idea she was really in prison.
translation.ko: 정말 미안해 진짜 교도소에 계신 줄 몰랐어

translation.en: She's not. Psych!
-[all laugh] -Got 'em.
You're so funny.
Hey, you made it. Great job.
That was a tough hike. All the other teams gave up.
translation.ko: 힘든 산행이라 다른 팀들은 다 포기했거든

translation.en: Well, not us.
Right. 'Cause when the going gets tough...
I call my publicist!
Therapist?
Life coach?
Can someone give me a hint?
Yeah, dump these chumps. They are not on your level.
translation.ko: 이 멍청이들은 버려요 케일리 수준에 안 맞아요

translation.en: Why are they walking like my nana when her bunions act up?
translation.ko: 왜 무지외반증으로 고통받는 우리 할머니처럼 걷죠?

translation.en: Oh, they all got these wicked blisters. Like, out of nowhere.
Way to go, Valeria.
Remind me never to cross you.
The blisters are just the beginning. Wait 'til they go home and try to pee.
translation.ko: 물집은 시작에 불과해 집에 가서 소변볼 때 더 괴로울걸

translation.en: Hey, Kaylie, you thirsty?
You wish.
Sure.
Thanks.
Well, we should probably head back down before we lose the light.
translation.ko: 그럼 해 떨어지기 전에 이만 내려갈게

translation.en: We'll be right behind you.
I'm sick of being behind them.
I don't mind the view.
We'll get 'em next time.
We have a whole year to win that Wilderness Trophy.
translation.ko: 야영 트로피 우승 팀은 연말에 결정되잖아

translation.en: Absolutely.
And now that we're a team, there's nothing we can't do.
translation.ko: 이제 우린 팀이니까 뭐든 해낼 수 있어

translation.en: No challenge we can't face together.
translation.ko: 함께라면 어떤 도전도 극복할 수 있지

translation.en: Yeah!
You know what? You're right. But first, we have to get back down the mountain.
translation.ko: 케일리 말이 맞아요 근데 일단 하산부터 하죠

translation.en: Right. Okay, so where's the escalator?
It's right over there next to the gift shop.
Ooh, shopping! I hope they take Kaylies!
translation.ko: 쇼핑 타임이다! 케일리화를 받아줘야 할 텐데!

translation.en: ♪ Ay, ay, Team Kaylie ♪
